mention.text: the Senate Judiciary Committee over what impact Judge Robert Bork 's free-market approach to antitrust law would have on competition and consumers '' A wide array of anti-competitive practices which have been specifically outlawed by statute or -LRB- by -RRB- settled Supreme Court precedent would be rendered lawful if Judge Bork 's antitrust views held sway , '' New York Attorney General Robert Abrams warned yesterday , as the committee concluded 12 days of hearings on the Supreme Court nomination
The 60-year-old Judge Bork , a federal appeals court judge antitrust thinking
a federal appeals court judge antitrust thinking

dean of Georgetown University Law School and a former Federal Trade Commission member
